To visit GETUS, please click here.

Virtual Private Servers (KVM VPS) on GETUS include 1,000GB Premium bandwidth on 1000mbps lines to provide end-users a blazing fast experience. All Virtual Private Servers on GETUS are month to month, included 24/7/365 technical support and are deployed in less than 24 hours. KVM supports either Linux or Windows software options. All our servers are located in North Carolina, Lenoir in the Centrilogic Data Centre.

- We offer 1,000GB Premium Bandwidth included in all our plans.
